subject: READ THE ATTACHED PAYMENT FI

subject: Re:   READ THE ATTACHED PAYMENT FI
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I've received your message regarding the attached payment file. However, I'm unable to see any attachments in your previous message. Could you please resend it? 

Also, could you provide a bit more information about what this payment is related to? It would be really helpful for me to understand the context better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Melissa
